entities.description: Activity involving the purchase or receipt of illegal goods.
Activity involving the creation, production, or distribution of illegal goods or propaganda.
Activity involving the distribution or sale of illegal goods.
Activity involving the abuse or exploitation of minors.
Involvement in gang activities not otherwise specified.
Involvement in gang activities specific to juveniles.
No known involvement in gang activities.
Activity involving the support or operation of illegal activities.
Activity involving the possession or hiding of illegal goods.
Activity involving the transportation, transmission, or importation of illegal goods.
Activity involving the use or consumption of illegal substances.
Activity involving deliberate harm or torture.
Activity involving neglect, either simple or severe.
Activity involving the sexual abuse of animals.

relationships.description: Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in buying or receiving illegal goods.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in the cultivation, manufacturing, or publishing of illegal items.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in distributing or selling illegal goods.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in the exploitation of children.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in unspecified gang activities.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in juvenile-specific gang activities.
Indicates no known involvement in gang activities by a gang member.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in operating, promoting, or assisting illegal activities.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in the possession or concealing of illegal goods.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in transporting, transmitting, or importing illegal goods.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in using or consuming illegal substances.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in intentional abuse and torture.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in simple or gross neglect.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in organized abuse.
Relation denoting a gang member's involvement in animal sexual abuse.
